src:
Jelang Rilis Inflasi Oktober, IHSG Dibuka Negatif di 6.213
01 Nov 2019, 02:08 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Foto: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) dibuka negatif pagi ini. Jelang rilis data inflasi Oktober 2019, IHSG turun 15 poin (0,25%) ke level 6.213.Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini menguat ke level Rp 14.065.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG minus 2 poin (0,04%) ke 6.225. Indeks LQ45 turun 2,6 poin (0,27%) ke 996.Membuka perdagangan Jumat (1/11/2019), IHSG terus turun 15 poin (0,25%) ke level 6.213. Sementara indeks LQ45 turun 2,9 poin ke 981.Bursa Amerika Serikat ditutup Melemah. Dow Jones ditutup 27,046.23 (-0.52%), NASDAQ ditutup 8,292.36 (-0.14%), S&P 500 ditutup 3,037.57 (-0.30%).Bursa saham US ditutup melemah meskipun laporan keuangan beberapa perusahaan di US lebih baik daripada perkiraan analis. Investor pada sesi perdagangan kemarin lebih berfokus pada perkembangan perjanjian dagang antara US dan China yang sebelumnya mendapatkan informasi dari negara Chille dimana US dan China akan bertemu di sebuah acara, ternyata dibatalkan oleh Chille. President Trump telah mengumumkan bahwa US dan China sedang mencari lokasi untuk melanjutkan penandatanganan perjanjian dagang fase 1.Bursa Asia pagi ini bergerak variatif, berikut pergerakannya:Indeks Nikkei 225 turun 91 poin ke 22.835Indeks Hang Seng bertambah 13 poin ke 26.919Indeks Shanghai naik 2 poin ke 2.931Indeks Strait Times melemah 16 poin ke 3.213 Simak Video "Dolar Tembus Rp 14.200 "[Gambas:Video 20detik](eds/eds)
text:
Ahead of the October Inflation Release, the JCI was opened Negatively at 6.213
Nov 01 2019, 02:08 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Photo: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - The Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) opened negative this morning. Ahead of the release of October 2019 inflation data, CSPI fell 15 points (0.25%) to the level of 6,213. The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning strengthened to the level of Rp 14,065. In pre-trade, CSPI minus 2 points (0, 04%) to 6,225. The LQ45 index fell 2.6 points (0.27%) to 996. Opening trading on Friday (11/01/2019), the JCI continued to fall 15 points (0.25%) to 6,213. While the LQ45 index fell 2.9 points to 981. United States Stocks closed Weak. Dow Jones closed 27,046.23 (-0.52%), NASDAQ closed 8,292.36 (-0.14%), S&P 500 closed 3,037.57 (-0.30%). US stock markets closed lower despite financial statements of several companies in the US were better than analyst estimates. Investors at yesterday's trading session focused more on the development of a trade agreement between the US and China which had previously received information from the Chille country where the US and China would meet at an event, apparently canceled by Chille. President Trump has announced that the US and China are looking for locations to continue the signing of phase 1 trade agreements. Asian Stock Exchange moves varied this morning, following its movements: Nikkei 225 index down 91 points to 22,835 Hang Seng Index added 13 points to 26,919 Shanghai Index rose 2 points 2,931 Strait Times Index weakened by 16 points to 3,213 Watch Video "Dollar Breaks Rp 14,200" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (eds / eds)
